properties.entry: SELECT SC.RECIPE_NO , RECIPE_TITLE , COOKING_TIME , RC.LIKE_COUNT , MAIN_IMG , NICKNAME , PROFILE_IMG , RC.AVRG_STAR_POINT FROM RECIPE RC JOIN SCRAP SC ON RC.RECIPE_NO = SC.RECIPE_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = RC.USER_NO WHERE SC.USER_NO = ?
DELETE FROM SCRAP WHERE RECIPE_NO = ? AND USER_NO = ?
